item.title: Web Scraper - Valorant Data Analysis
item.description: Summary I was originally looking for a Valorant API to analyse some of my own match data, however Riot games do not hand out personal API keys for this game. I figured I could scrape some of my own match data which is publically available on the web client side. Though the data is fairly limited due to built in limitations of the Riot Valorant API. The website only pulls 30 matches worth of data.
